General.Name: Bank Agris Tbk
General.Description: PT Bank IBK Indonesia Tbk provides banking products and services in Indonesia. The company accepts savings and giro accounts, and deposits. It also offers working capital loans, investment loans, consumption/consumptive credit, joint financing, and consumer loans; trade finance products, including export documentary and transfer letter of credit, negotiation, export documentary collection, document against payment and acceptance, import documentary credit, L/C amendment and settlement, trust receipt, short term import loans, letter of guarantee/shipping guarantee, domestic letter of loans, and letter of credit/guarantee. In addition, the company provides ATM, foreign exchange, and remittance services. It has branches, sub-branches, and cash offices located in Medan, Pekanbaru, Palembang, Bandar Lampung, Jakarta, Tangerang, Bekasi, Bandung, Solo, Semarang, Surabaya, Solo, and Pontianak. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Bank IBK Indonesia Tbk operates as a  subsidiary of Industrial Bank of Korea.

9.Name: Ms. Imelda  Kharisman
9.Title: Head of Bus. & Product Devel. Division
